name: Party The Gatherer
description:
The best party battle of the world. - Fight with another party raft.
- Make your music the loudest And destroying and inviting the opposite side to join our party.
- A lot of NPC & Boss Fight How to Play
================================= Controller [A][W][S][D] = Movement / [J ] = Attack
1. Attack another raft.
2. Collect enemy on the river.
3. Go back to our raft. Team Developer
  • Lusty
  • Yah
  • NYX
Background

This is Game from Gamejam From Home, an online for thai jammer activity , hosted by DAYDEV CO.,LTD. and  Sponsor. 

The theme is: "Your Old School House Party"

This game takes 48 hours to develop.

Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Party The Gatherer.exe
  • Open speaker & Enjoy

#gamejamformhome
